title: `WARN powchain: Unable to cache headers for execution client votes`
body:
# 🐞 Bug Report ### Description Getting this warning ever so often. I'm not sure if this is normal or not: ``` WARN powchain: Unable to cache headers for execution client votes error=(1664692311 > 1663224162): provided time is later than the current eth1 head ``` ### Has this worked before in a previous version? No idea, I'm new to Prysm. ## 🔬 Minimal Reproduction Start up Erigon as execution client and once it is fully synced, sync up Prysm v3.1.1 to the beacon chain on mainnet. ## 🔥 Error Prysm (Consensus layer): 

Starting Prysm beacon-chain --execution-endpoint=http://localhost:8551 --jwt-secret=/pool/ethereum/erigon-db/jwt.hex --datadir /pool/ethereum/.eth2
